item.title: Tata Communications updates the jamvee unified communications platform
item.description:
Tata Communications, a global communications provider, recently launched the newest version of its cloud-based unified communications platform, jamvee. Source: Jamvee website. Leveraging Tata Communications’ robust global network, jamvee consolidates various client software and devices into a single, secure, and versatile platform. This approach streamlines communication and collaboration within and across organizations, allowing employees, suppliers, and customers to connect seamlessly using any combination of audio, video, messaging, and content sharing tools, regardless of their device or browser...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/tata-communications-updates-the-jamvee-unified-communications-platform/
